contents.Text: [[[strong:Left click]]] this button saves the current state of Colour fields to disk
[[[strong:Right click]]] to reset the previous saved state (This can be used for experimentation example try change a colour and then revert back to the previous state)
[[[strong:Left click]]] this button to switch between the 3 presets [[[strong:Super Dark]], [[[strong:Dark]], [[[strong:Light]]]]
These are the individual colour tweaks for the [[[strong:Theme Mode]]] you are currently using
[[[strong:• Widget Colours]]] This is all the individual colours for the widgets in the program
[[[strong:• Background Colours]]] This is the background colours for the widgets in the program
[[[strong:• Text Colours]]] This is the text colours for the widgets in the program
[[[strong:• Window & Borders]]] This is the window and border colours for the widgets in the program
[[[strong:• Specials]]] This is for toggles that do not fit into the other categories
[[[strong:• Advanced Settings]]] This are for theme settings that affect shapes of the widgets in the program e.g. [[[strong:Handle Shape]]] for sliders
[[[warning:NOTE]]] You can always change something then revert it back to the previous state by right clicking the [[[strong:Save Theme]]] button.
